However, both men are pushed to their limits by the rise of the Joker, a criminal mastermind spreading chaos and destruction throughout the city for his own amusement. Comic-book thriller, starring Christian Bale, Aaron Eckhart and an Oscar-winning Heath Ledger(n).(n)

programme.title: Some Kind of Hate
programme.desc: A teenager who has been bullied for years is sent to a new school for troubled students, and finds himself the victim once more. His plight summons up the spirit of a girl who was driven to suicide by bullying, and who decides to inflict murderous punishments on his tormentors. Horror, starring Ronen Rubinstein and Sierra McCormick(n).(n)

programme.title: The Bridge on the River Kwai
programme.desc: A British colonel in a Japanese PoW camp is ordered to build a railway bridge over a river, forging a vital communications link. At first he refuses to obey, but eventually agrees to take the project on - and becomes so obsessed with the task that he creates a dilemma for an American soldier sent to destroy the structure. David Lean's Oscar-winning Second World War drama, starring Alec Guinness, William Holden and Jack Hawkins(n).(n)

programme.title: Charlie Wilson's War
programme.desc: A US congressman gets embroiled in a secret mission to provide covert military support to rebels in Soviet-occupied Afghanistan. Before long, he finds unlikely allies in the shape of a womanising CIA agent, a Texan socialite and the president of Pakistan. Fact-based political drama set during the 1980s, starring Tom Hanks, Julia Roberts and Philip Seymour Hoffman(n).(n)

programme.title: The New World
programme.desc: A 17th-century English settler in America falls in love with a native princess, but as conflict erupts between their people he is forced to abandon her. She is converted to Christianity, adopting European culture and forming a romance with a tobacco planter, but remains torn between two worlds. Terrence Malick's epic historical drama, starring Colin Farrell, Q'orianka Kilcher, Christian Bale and Christopher Plummer(n).(n)

programme.title: American Sniper
programme.desc: A Navy Seal becomes a legend to his colleagues thanks to his skills as a deadly sniper, but he finds living an ordinary life as a husband and father difficult to deal with. Biopic based on the experiences of real-life Iraq conflict veteran Chris Kyle, directed by Clint Eastwood and starring Bradley Cooper, Sienna Miller and Kyle Gallner(n).(n)

programme.title: The Machinist
programme.desc: A factory worker suffering from chronic insomnia has not slept properly in more than a year. When his extreme fatigue results in a tragic accident, his colleagues turn on him and he sinks into a state of intense paranoia, becoming obsessed with a man nobody else believes exists. Psychological thriller, starring Christian Bale, Jennifer Jason Leigh and Michael Ironside(n).(n)

programme.title: Three Days of the Condor
programme.desc: A bookish CIA researcher returns to his field office to find all his colleagues have been murdered in his absence. When he tries to uncover the truth, he also ends up targeted for assassination by his own agency, and is forced to go on the run to discover the reasons why. Sydney Pollack's thriller, starring Robert Redford, Faye Dunaway, Cliff Robertson and Max von Sydow(n).(n)

programme.title: The Burning
programme.desc: A mysterious man attempts to rescue a young woman who has been kidnapped by the mercenaries who murdered her father and took control of his farm. Argentinean Western drama, starring Gael Garcia Bernal, Alice Braga and Claudio Tolcachir(n).(n)

programme.title: The Salvation
programme.desc: A Danish settler in the Wild West is joined by his wife and son, but they are soon murdered. He avenges their deaths, but his actions attract the wrath of a ruthless gang leader. Abandoned by his friends and neighbours, the peaceful pioneer is forced to stand alone to enforce the law in his new home. Western, starring Mads Mikkelsen and Eva Green(n).(n)

programme.title: Irrational Man
programme.desc: A troubled philosophy professor begins teaching at a small town college, but struggles to find any meaning in his life. He finds some measure of happiness in his friendship with a student, and when they overhear a stranger's conversation, it spurs the tortured academic on to a course of action that changes everything. Woody Allen's drama, starring Joaquin Phoenix, Emma Stone and Parker Posey(n).(n)

programme.title: American Sniper
programme.desc: A Navy Seal becomes a legend to his colleagues thanks to his skills as a deadly sniper, but he finds living an ordinary life as a husband and father difficult to deal with. Biopic based on the experiences of real-life Iraq conflict veteran Chris Kyle, directed by Clint Eastwood and starring Bradley Cooper, Sienna Miller and Kyle Gallner(n).(n)

programme.title: Stations of the Cross
programme.desc: A girl from a strict Catholic family is an outsider in her secular school, and faces constant reproach from her fundamentalist mother. Under the tuition of a misguided priest, she pushes herself to extreme acts of self-sacrifice in her pursuit of spiritual redemption. Drama, starring Lea van Acken and Florian Stetter. In German, French and Latin(n).(n)

programme.title: A Clockwork Orange
programme.desc: Sadistic young gang leader Alex leads a carefree life indulging his love of rape, violence and classical music. When he is finally arrested, he is subjected to a sinister form of aversion therapy that brainwashes him into being physically unable to use violence. However, on his release, he finds friends and family have turned on him, while others seek to exploit him to further their political ends. Drama, starring Malcolm McDowell and Warren Clarke(n).(n)

programme.title: Ace in the Hole
programme.desc: An abrasive, hard-drinking reporter is reduced to working for a small-town newspaper, where he discovers a man trapped in a mine shaft. He sees a chance to revive his career, and manipulates the rescue operation to drag things out as long as possible, creating a media circus but putting the man's life in jeopardy. Billy Wilder's drama, starring Kirk Douglas and Jan Sterling(n).(n)

programme.title: National Lampoon's Animal House
programme.desc: A college's most slobbish and unruly student fraternity faces expulsion for upsetting the rigid social order of the campus, so its madcap members plan one final act of rebellion against the college dean and a preppy bunch of snobbish bullies at the annual university homecoming parade. Comedy, starring John Belushi, Tim Matheson, Donald Sutherland, Karen Allen and Tom Hulce(n).(n)

programme.title: Dangerous Liaisons
programme.desc: A philandering aristocrat in 18th-century France schemes with his manipulative former lover to seduce a virtuous young woman. As their conspiracy becomes ever more tangled, events take an unexpected turn. Stephen Frears' Oscar-winning drama of sexual politics, based on Pierre Choderlos de Laclos' novel, starring John Malkovich, Glenn Close, Michelle Pfeiffer, Swoosie Kurtz, Uma Thurman and Keanu Reeves(n).(n)

programme.title: Colt 45
programme.desc: Vincent, a young police firearms expert, is forced to make use of his skills as a marksman when he is ambushed by an unknown assailant. Left with a killing to cover up, Vincent turns to a fellow gun enthusiast with ties to the criminal underworld offers to help him dispose of the evidence. In exchange, he hands over a small arsenal of weapons - including a set of home-made, explosive .45 ammo, but when said guns are used in a string of deadly robberies, Vincent must turn to seasoned police commander Chavez to help correct his fatal error of judgement. French action thriller, starring Ymanol Perset, Joey Starr and Gerard Lanvin(n).(n)

programme.title: Birdman: Or (The Unexpected Virtue of Ignorance) (2014)
programme.desc: A faded movie star famous for his role in a series of superhero movies 20 years previously tries to reclaim his artisitic integrity by directing and starring in a Broadway play. The experience plunges him into a personal crisis as both the production and his own family are beset by a series of disasters. Oscar-winning drama, starring Michael Keaton, Edward Norton and Emma Stone(n).(n)

programme.title: Funny Face
programme.desc: A high-flying photographer arranges a photoshoot in a Greenwich bookshop, where his head is turned by one of the employees. He persuades the shy bookworm to model for him in Paris, and romance blossoms between them as he endeavours to transform her into a fashion icon. Musical, starring Fred Astaire, Audrey Hepburn, Kay Thompson, Michel Auclair and Robert Flemyng, with songs by George and Ira Gershwin(n).(n)

programme.title: Four Corners
programme.desc: A 13-year-old boy raised in South Africa's Cape Flats gets caught up in a volatile subculture dominated by two rival gangs. Thriller, starring Brendon Daniels, Jezriel Skei and Lindiwe Matshikiza(n).(n)

programme.title: The Commitments
programme.desc: A would-be music producer from Dublin believes he can make it big in Ireland by promoting a top-rate soul band, so he trawls a working-class neighbourhood and auditions unlikely singers and musicians to put together as a group. Alan Parker's urban comedy, based on the novel by Roddy Doyle, starring Robert Arkins, Andrew Strong, Michael Aherne, Angeline Ball and Maria Doyle Kennedy(n).(n)

programme.title: Grandma
programme.desc: A woman recovering from a break-up receives an unexpected visit from her granddaughter, who desperately needs to raise $600 before the end of the day. They visit a series of old contacts in search of a loan, which leads to long-buried secrets coming to light. Comedy drama, starring Lily Tomlin and Julia Garner(n).(n)

programme.title: No Country for Old Men
programme.desc: A Texan hunter who took a stash of money abandoned at the site of a botched drug deal is pursued across the state by an implacable hitman with no qualms about killing anyone who gets in his way. Meanwhile, a world-weary sheriff struggles to make sense of the escalating chain of violence. The Coen brothers' Oscar-winning crime thriller, starring Josh Brolin, Javier Bardem, Tommy Lee Jones, Kelly Macdonald and Woody Harrelson(n).(n)

programme.title: O Brother, Where Art Thou
programme.desc: Three bumbling crooks escape from a chain gang and strive to get their hands on some hidden loot, but encounter all manner of scrapes and strange characters along the way. The Coen brothers' comedy inspired by Homer's Odyssey, starring George Clooney, John Turturro, Tim Blake Nelson, John Goodman and Holly Hunter(n).(n)

programme.title: The Flight of the Phoenix
programme.desc: A plane crashes in the blazing heat of the desert - and as time passes, the crew and passengers realise their only chance of making it through the ordeal alive is to repair the badly damaged craft. Adventure, starring James Stewart, Richard Attenborough, Peter Finch and Ernest Borgnine(n).(n)

programme.title: The Cowboys
programme.desc: An ageing rancher finds himself short-handed when his workers abandon him during a gold rush, and grudgingly hires a group of schoolboys to help him on a 400-mile cattle drive. Although at first they feel out of their depth, the youngsters quickly learn to work like men - but face a dangerous challenge ahead as a gang of rustlers begins to stalk them. Western, with John Wayne, Roscoe Lee Browne and Bruce Dern(n).(n)

programme.title: Bell, Book and Candle
programme.desc: An alluring witch casts a spell on the handsome publisher who lives upstairs in her Manhattan apartment block to stop him marrying her old college rival. Meanwhile, her beatnik warlock brother is trying to write a novel in collaboration with a drunken novelist. Supernatural romantic comedy, starring James Stewart, Kim Novak, Jack Lemmon, Ernie Kovacs and Elsa Lanchester(n).(n)

programme.title: Hocus Pocus
programme.desc: A teenager in Salem, Massachusetts, breaks into a spooky house on Halloween and accidentally resurrects three witches who have been dead for 300 years. The sorceresses are soon causing chaos while seeking a suitable sacrifice for a ritual to give them eternal youth. However, an old foe - a boy they turned into a cat - is on hand to help stop their mischief. Supernatural Disney comedy, with Bette Midler, Sarah Jessica Parker, Kathy Najimy and Omri Katz(n).(n)

programme.title: Devil's Due
programme.desc: Premiere. A newlywed couple are surprised to discover they are expecting their first child soon after their honeymoon. The husband decides to document his wife's pregnancy on film, but witnesses her undergoing a strange transformation that leaves him wondering if there is something supernatural about the unborn baby. Horror, starring Allison Miller and Zach Gilford(n).(n)

programme.title: Fright Night
programme.desc: A teenager becomes convinced his new next door neighbour is a vampire responsible for a series of recent disappearances. Finding nobody is willing to believe his unlikely story, he seeks the aid of a washed-up movie star famous for playing a vampire hunter in destroying the monster. Comedy horror, starring Chris Sarandon, Roddy McDowall, William Ragsdale, Amanda Bearse and Stephen Geoffreys(n).(n)

programme.title: The Sixth Sense
programme.desc: A child psychologist, disheartened after the suicide of a former patient, takes on the case of a terrified boy haunted by ghostly apparitions, and tries to help him discover what the spirits want from him. M Night Shyamalan's supernatural thriller, starring Bruce Willis, Haley Joel Osment, Toni Collette and Olivia Williams(n).(n)

programme.title: FilmFear: Fright Bites
programme.desc: All six of the horror shorts from the Film4 series, featuring Short Cut, Night Cap, Wake, Tickle Monster, Old Gal and Squeal(n).(n)

programme.title: The Black Swan
programme.desc: Notorious pirate Henry Morgan is made governor of Jamaica, and offers other buccaneers the choice of giving up their lawless ways or facing justice. Two rogues refuse to toe the line, so Morgan's trusted ally James Waring is sent to track them down, but has other things on his mind - namely winning the daughter of the previous governor away from her duplicitous fiance. High-seas adventure, with Tyrone Power, Laird Cregar, George Sanders, Maureen O'Hara and Anthony Quinn(n).(n)

programme.title: Escape to Athena
programme.desc: Second World War Allied PoWs incarcerated on a Greek island plan to defy the SS by breaking out of prison and pulling off an art robbery, with the help of their liberal-minded camp commandant. Action adventure, with Roger Moore, David Niven, Telly Savalas, Elliott Gould, Stefanie Powers and Claudia Cardinale(n).(n)

programme.title: To Hell and Back
programme.desc: Biopic of actor Audie Murphy, following his service in the Second World War. Enlisting in the Army as a teenager to support his younger siblings, he excelled himself in action in the conflict in Europe and became one of America's most decorated soldiers. Starring Murphy as himself alongside Marshall Thompson, Charles Drake and Gregg Palmer(n).(n)

programme.title: Carry On Nurse
programme.desc: The patients on the men's ward of Haven Hospital cause more mayhem for the staff than the rest of the hospital combined, forcing the management to send in a formidable matron to control the situation. Feeling aggrieved by her no-nonsense methods, the chaps decide the time is right to get their own back. Comedy, with Kenneth Williams, Hattie Jacques, Joan Sims, Kenneth Connor, Charles Hawtrey, Shirley Eaton and Leslie Phillips(n).(n)

programme.title: The Adjustment Bureau
programme.desc: A politician is attracted to a dancer he meets at a pivotal moment in his life, but finds his every effort to get to know her is thwarted by a group of mysterious men. He realises these shadowy figures are manipulating him and moving him toward a predetermined fate, which he resolves to fight. Sci-fi thriller, starring Matt Damon and Emily Blunt(n).(n)

programme.title: The Imitation Game
programme.desc: Biopic of mathematician Alan Turing, whose work during the Second World War translated seemingly unbreakable Nazi codes as well as pioneering the development of computer technology. In the years following the war, his life would be destroyed as his homosexuality was discovered, leaving him facing criminal charges. Starring Benedict Cumberbatch, Keira Knightley and Charles Dance(n).(n)

programme.title: Source Code
programme.desc: A military pilot is the subject of a top-secret experiment that transfers his mind into the body of a man killed in a terrorist bombing on a train, but only for the last eight minutes of the dead man's life. His mission is to use that time to find out who is responsible and if they intend to strike again. Sci-fi thriller, starring Jake Gyllenhaal, Michelle Monaghan, Vera Farmiga and Jeffrey Wright(n).(n)

programme.title: Christmas Lilies of the Field
programme.desc: A soldier completes his tour of duty, and decides to visit a group of nuns whom he one built a chapel for. He finds himself still inspired by their devotion to helping others, and puts his skills at their disposal once again, this time building an orphanage and a school. Drama sequel, starring Billy Dee Williams and Maria Schell(n).(n)

programme.title: On the Second Day of Christmas
programme.desc: A woman and her niece are caught stealing just before Christmas, and face the prospect of spending the festive season in the care of social services - until a kindly shop worker volunteers to put them up. Romantic drama, starring Mary Stuart Masterson and Mark Ruffalo(n).(n)

programme.title: Our Gift of Love
programme.desc: A freak accident leaves a man in a coma shortly before Christmas. While friends and family urge his wife to prepare for the worst, she refuses to accept he will not recover and dedicates herself to taking care of him. Drama, starring Rebecca De Mornay, Henry Czerny, Barclay Hope and Lila Yee(n).(n)

programme.title: Ebbie
programme.desc: A high-flying but mean-hearted female department store executive is brought back down to earth with a bump by three spooks determined to put a smile on her face in preparation for the Christmas season's celebrations. Festive drama based on the Dickens' tale, starring Susan Lucci, Wendy Crewson, Ron Lea, Jeffrey DeMunn and Molly Parker(n).(n)

programme.title: The Christmas Stallion
programme.desc: A 16-year-old girl adores the horses she and her grandfather have raised in the Welsh mountains, but when her grandfather dies, a tragic past is revealed. Drama, starring Daniel J Travanti, Lynette Davies and Sian MacLean(n).(n)

programme.title: A Christmas Reunion
programme.desc: An orphan yearns to be closer to his ageing grandfather, and his wish is granted after a visit to Santa Claus reveals a few home truths. Drama, with Edward Woodward, James Coburn and Meredith Edwards(n).(n)

programme.title: The Christmas List
programme.desc: A shop assistant is frustrated at her lack of success at work and fed up with her boyfriend taking her for granted. She writes a list of the things she wants out of life, which ends up in the shop's mailbox for children's letters to Santa. Magically, her wishes start coming true, but not always in the way she hoped. Fantasy drama, starring Mimi Rogers, Rob Stewart and Stella Stevens(n).(n)

programme.title: Undercover Christmas
programme.desc: An FBI agent reluctantly agrees to keep a close eye on a waitress who put herself in the firing line when she spoke up about her boyfriend's criminal activities. However, the witness protection job takes a turn for the unexpected when the lawman has to return to his hometown for Christmas - dragging the damsel in distress with him. Romantic comedy, starring Jami Gertz, Shawn Christian and Tyne Daly(n).(n)

programme.title: The Case for Christmas
programme.desc: A greedy business mogul is still bitter about not receiving the presents he wanted as a child, so decides to sue Santa Claus. Needing legal representation, the jolly old man turns to a lawyer desperately trying to balance his career and his responsibilities as a father. Festive comedy, starring Dean Cain, Rachel Blanchard and George Buza(n).(n)

programme.title: Mistletoe Over Manhattan
programme.desc: Santa Claus's wife goes to New York to perform a Christmas miracle and give her husband fresh inspiration. She befriends a cop who is in the middle of a divorce and offers to become a nanny to his children. She then discovers he still loves his wife, and tries to find a way to bring them back together. Seasonal fantasy, starring Tricia Helfer and Greg Bryk(n).(n)

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: The lives and adventures of a family living in a mountain town in 1930s America(n).(n)

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: The family find a runaway boy hiding in the barn, and learns he has walked all the way from North Carolina. Guest starring Todd Bridges(n).(n)

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.sub-title: He Was Only Twelve - Part Two.
programme.desc: Part two of three. Charles undergoes a deep religious experience as his son's life hangs in the balance after being shot(n).(n)

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.sub-title: There's No Place Like Home - Part One.
programme.desc: Part one of two. The Ingalls, Oleson and Garvey families get tired of the bustling city life and decide to return to Walnut Grove, where a shock awaits them(n).(n)

programme.title: I'll Be Home for Christmas
programme.desc: A couple in a small New England town during the Second World War await the return of their two sons and daughter for Christmas. Drama, starring Hal Holbrook, Eva Marie Saint, Jason Oliver, Courteney Cox, Peter Gallagher and Nancy Travis(n).(n)

programme.title: A Wind at My Back Christmas
programme.desc: Family members struggling to survive in Depression-era Ontario have their lives touched by the impending war in Europe when an unexpected visitor arrives. This seasonal drama is a spin-off from a hugely popular Canadian TV series, and stars Dylan Provencher, Tyrone Savage and James Carroll(n).(n)

programme.title: A Dream for Christmas
programme.desc: An Arkansas minister moves his family across America when he is placed in charge of a Los Angeles church, only to find the congregation is small and the building threatened with demolition. The clergyman is determined to make a success of his new posting, and as Christmas approaches, something miraculous occurs. Drama, starring Hari Rhodes and Beah Richards(n).(n)

programme.title: The Christmas Choir
programme.desc: A workaholic accountant is forced to reassess his priorities after his devotion to his job costs him his girlfriend. An encounter with a homeless pianist reminds him of his forgotten dream of becoming a musician, so he decides to help the residents of a homeless shelter earn some money by forming a choir. Drama, starring Jason Gedrick and Tyrone Benskin(n).(n)

programme.title: A Christmas Snow
programme.desc: A woman refuses to celebrate Christmas, because of her father abandoning his family during the holiday. When a fierce blizzard strikes her town in the run-up to the big day, she is forced to give shelter to two strangers, and as she gets to know them, she begins to rethink her bitter outlook on life. Festive drama, starring Catherine Mary Stewart and Muse Watson(n).(n)

programme.title: The Christmas Takeover
programme.desc: The cold-hearted owner of a toy company is determined to drive all competitors out of business - including Santa Claus. He heads for the North Pole to take over the workshop, but has a crisis of conscience that leads him to try to make amends to his neglected family. Comedy drama, starring Harry Hamlin, William Hootkins and Megan Gallagher(n).(n)

programme.title: A Carol Christmas
programme.desc: A self-interested TV talk-show host with heaps of money and a bad attitude vows to pull out all the stops to ensure she avoids any hint of seasonal goodwill, a plan that falls to pieces when three ghosts pay her an unscheduled visit to teach her a lesson. Festive comedy drama based on Dickens' classic story A Christmas Carol, with Tori Spelling, Dinah Manoff, Michael Landes, Jason Brooks and William Shatner(n).(n)

programme.title: The Christmas List

programme.title: Rocky Balboa
programme.desc: When a cable channel runs a computer boxing simulation that predicts an in-his-prime Rocky Balboa would win a fight against the current heavyweight champion, the aging, retired Balboa - now a widowed Philadelphia restaurant owner - begins considering a very late-career comeback. Sylvester Stallone stars in, writes, and directs this charming final installment in the "Rocky" saga, costarring Milo Ventimiglia, Geraldine Hughes, Burt Young and Antonio Tarver(n).(n)

programme.title: Skinwalkers
programme.desc: A young boy on the cusp of manhood becomes the focus of a long-running war between factions of werewolves in this gritty horror fantasy starring Jason Behr, Matthew Knight, Rhona Mitra and Elias Koteas(n).(n)

programme.desc: Kiefer and Donald Sutherland share the screen in this brooding western about an embittered gunslinger who attempts to make amends with his estranged father whilst their community is besieged by ruthless land-grabbers(n).(n)

programme.desc: Based on a true story, Jean-Claude Van Damme stars as an American soldier, who decides to leave the military and compete in a famous Hong Kong martial arts tournament that is a notoriously dangerous fight to the death(n).(n)

programme.title: No Escape
programme.desc: An international thriller starring Owen Wilson as an American businessman who resettles his family to a new home in Southeast Asia, where they unwittingly find themselves in the middle of a violent political uprising. Co-stars Pierce Brosnan(n).(n)

Jackson as hit-man partners whose meandering paths cross those of a powerful gangster (Ving Rhames), the latter's overdosing girlfriend (Uma Thurman), a desperate boxer (Bruce Willis) and a pair of stickup artists named Honeybunny (Amanda Plummer) and Pumpkin (Tim Roth). "Leaves viewers both exhilarated and exhausted - hearts racing and knuckles white from the ride." -Amazon.com(n).(n)

programme.title: Frank Miller's Sin City: A Dame to Kill For
programme.desc: Frank Miller's classic graphic novels return to the screen, weaving together gritty tales that feature Basin City's most hardboiled citizens as they cross paths with the town's more notorious inhabitants. Stars Jessica Alba, Josh Brolin and Mickey Rourke(n).(n)

programme.title: F/X
programme.desc: Bryan Brown stars as a special-effects expert for low-budget Hollywood movies who his hired to fake the assassination of a gangster who wants to avoid testifying against his former mob bosses. Co-stars Jerry Orbach and Brian Dennehy(n).(n)

programme.title: Meru
programme.desc: In the high-stakes game of big-wall climbing, the Shark's Fin on Mount Meru may be the ultimate prize. In this documentary three close friends - who are among the world's best professional climbers - battle their complicated pasts, inner demons and nature's harshest elements in an attempt to confront what is arguably the most technically complicated and dangerous peak in the Himalayas - one that has never been scaled to completion(n).(n)

programme.title: Deal
programme.desc: After twenty years away from the poker tables, a retired gambler gets back into the big time with an Ivy League-educated protege with dreams of taking his talents to Las Vegas. Bret Harrison, Burt Reynolds and Shannon Elizabeth star in this drama(n).(n)

programme.desc: An ambitious, beautiful TV news reporter climbs the ladder of broadcasting success while romancing her more experienced mentor in this romantic drama that plays like "A Star is Born" set in the world of journalism. Michelle Pfeiffer, Robert Redford and Stockard Channing star(n).(n)

programme.title: Flyboys

James Franco, Martin Henderson, Tyler Labine, Jean Reno and Jennifer Decker star in this stirringly patriotic salute to forgotten heroes(n).(n)

programme.title: W. Kamau Bell: Semi-Prominent Negro

programme.title: The Hybrid
programme.desc: An elite team of mercenaries are chosen to carry out a covert operation deep in a former Soviet State that sends them into a maze of tunnels inhabited by menacing creatures and towards an underground laboratory where they must secure specimens of genetically engineered human and alien hybrids(n).(n)

But he is starting to question his mission. Is he creating more terrorists than he's killing and will the war ever end? Stars Ethan Hawke and January Jones(n).(n)

programme.title: The Wicked Within

programme.title: Jej Szerokość Afrodyta
programme.desc: Podczas bankietu stróżów prawa Jane odbiera nagrodę za wzorową współpracę z policją. Nagle uroczystość przerywa Hope Prentiss, która zarzuca Bingum, że zniszczyła jej małżeństwo, romansując z jej mężem. Oskarżenia są poważne, ale Jane jest przekonana, że to nieporozumienie. Co prawda nie pamięta nic ze swojej przeszłości, ale nie wierzy, by mogła związać się z żonatym mężczyzną. Hope pokazuje jednak zdjęcia jednoznacznie dowodzące, że Bingum spotykała się z Toddem Prentissem w motelu. Co więcej, ten policjant zniknął bez śladu osiem miesięcy temu, wkrótce po rzekomej randce z Jane. By rozwiązać tę zagadkę, Bingum musi lepiej poznaą swoją przeszłość. Tymczasem Grayson staje do sądowej batalii z byłym narzeczonym swojej obecnej dziewczyny Vanessy, Willem Caseyem. Musi przekonać go, by nie przenosił on fabryki do Meksyku, wskutek czego wszyscy amerykańscy pracownicy jego firmy stracą pracę. Dla Kenta to bardzo ważna sprawa, także ze względów osobistych(n).(n)

programme.title: Jej Szerokość Afrodyta
programme.desc: Parker zleca Kim obronę A.J. Fowlera, producenta popularnego reality show "Ta jedyna". Formuła programu zakłada, że kawaler wybiera narzeczoną spośród 30 kandydatek. Wendy Simon odpadła w finale, a teraz oskarża Fowlera o spowodowanie cierpień emocjonalnych. Kim i Parker krok po kroku odkrywają tajemnice tego show i trafiają na trop prawdziwej historii miłosnej, która wydarzyła się na jego planie. Tymczasem Grayson i Jane reprezentują Evana Robbinsa, który został zwolniony z pracy z bardzo oryginalnego powodu. Po śmierci żony zaczął bowiem przeobrażać się w klauna, mimo że nie był zatrudniony w cyrku. Przychodził do pracy w kostiumie i w pełnym makijażu. W ten sposób odreagowywał stratę ukochanej. Jego współpracownicy nie potrafili zrozumieć zachowania kolegi i złożyli przeciwko niemu pozew zbiorowy(n).(n)

programme.title: Projekt mąż

Tymczasem Grayson i Jane reprezentują Evana Robbinsa, który został zwolniony z pracy z bardzo oryginalnego powodu. Po śmierci żony zaczął bowiem przeobrażać się w klauna, mimo że nie był zatrudniony w cyrku. Przychodził do pracy w kostiumie i w pełnym makijażu. W ten sposób odreagowywał stratę ukochanej. Jego współpracownicy nie potrafili zrozumieć zachowania kolegi i złożyli przeciwko niemu pozew zbiorowy(n).(n)

programme.title: Jej Szerokość Afrodyta
programme.desc: Zdesperowana matka prosi Jane o pomoc. Odkryła bowiem, że ktoś umieścił w internecie nagie zdjęcia jej córki Abby. Wkrótce wychodzi na jaw, że dziewczyna jest prześladowana przez koleżankę z klasy, Madison Thomas. Mści się ona na Abby za to, że poinformowała władze szkoły o popełnionym przez nią przestępstwie. Matka prześladowczyni popiera działania córki. W efekcie obie nastolatki i ich adwokaci spotykają się w sądzie. Rozpoczyna się batalia, w wyniku której także Jane pada ofiarą cyberprzemocy. Tymczasem w kancelarii zjawia się jej współwłaścicielka Claire Harrison. Potrzebuje ona pomocy przy rozwodzie. Kilka lat temu prawniczka wyszła za mąż za surfera Simona Bella. Dzięki jej wiedzy i pomysłom założył on firmę kosmetyczną, która dziś jest warta fortunę. Teraz Claire chce się rozwieść, ale obawia się, że mąż nie będzie chętny, by oddać jej połowy majątku, mimo że przed laty spisali intercyzę. Problem w tym, że zrobili to na kawiarnianej serwetce..(n).(n)

programme.desc: Wzajemne relacje członków brytyjskiej rodziny królewskiej i dziennikarzy należą do bardzo skomplikowanych. Od połowy XX wieku informacje o wydarzeniach i skandalach na dworze Windsorów są jednymi z najbardziej pożądanych tematów przez media w całej Wielkiej Brytanii. Dokument pokazuje w jaki sposób dziennikarze traktują przedstawicieli rodziny oraz w jaki sposób odnosi się ona do mediów. programme.title: Jej Szerokość Afrodyta
programme.desc: Podczas bankietu stróżów prawa Jane odbiera nagrodę za wzorową współpracę z policją. Nagle uroczystość przerywa Hope Prentiss, która zarzuca Bingum, że zniszczyła jej małżeństwo, romansując z jej mężem. Oskarżenia są poważne, ale Jane jest przekonana, że to nieporozumienie. Co prawda nie pamięta nic ze swojej przeszłości, ale nie wierzy, by mogła związać się z żonatym mężczyzną. Hope pokazuje jednak zdjęcia jednoznacznie dowodzące, że Bingum spotykała się z Toddem Prentissem w motelu. Co więcej, ten policjant zniknął bez śladu osiem miesięcy temu, wkrótce po rzekomej randce z Jane. By rozwiązać tę zagadkę, Bingum musi lepiej poznaą swoją przeszłość. Tymczasem Grayson staje do sądowej batalii z byłym narzeczonym swojej obecnej dziewczyny Vanessy, Willem Caseyem. Musi przekonać go, by nie przenosił on fabryki do Meksyku, wskutek czego wszyscy amerykańscy pracownicy jego firmy stracą pracę. Dla Kenta to bardzo ważna sprawa, także ze względów osobistych(n).(n)

programme.title: Jej Szerokość Afrodyta
